text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom PO(S)TUS defers PPE acquisitions and COVID-19 response to governors and now he says they can’t run their own elections how they see fit? Hopefully DeSantis (FL) and Ducey(AZ) insist on in person voting especially for those 65 and older with co-morbidities. #MailItIn#TuckFrump2020
